Newshub’s AM host Melissa Chan-Green opens up on abusive relationship - Steve Braunias https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/melissa-chan-green-opens-up-on-abusive-relationship-steve-braunias/VYYUYREXAZEWLLNJAJYVZQNASI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/melissa-chan-green-opens-up-on-abusive-relationship-steve-braunias/VYYUYREXAZEWLLNJAJYVZQNASI/ Steve Braunias'Going to work was my happy place,' the AM host tells Steve Braunias. And it was kind of a break away from the reality of private life." Photo / Michael Craig
